content: I think I'll go with the Logitech MX Master 3. I've heard great things about Logitech's products. I'll definitely consider the factors you mentioned when choosing a new wireless mouse. By the way, I was thinking of cleaning my desktop computer again, and I was wondering if you could give me some tips on how to properly clean the fans and vents. I cleaned them last on February 1st, and I want to make sure I do it right again.
